title: "Avengers: Endgame" May Not Be Done Breaking Box Office Records
itunes:title: "Avengers: Endgame" May Not Be Done Breaking Box Office Records
description:
This week, "Avengers: Endgame" directors Joe and Anthony Russo joined to discuss their record-breaking new Marvel movie. Beyond Meat Founder and CEO Ethan Brown came on to talk about his plant-based protein company's IPO, which was the best debut since the financial crisis. Jason Boyce, Co-Founder and CEO of Avenue7Media joined to discuss his experience as a third-party seller on Amazon and how the site has evolved from a partner to a competitor. Then Citgroup's Chief Political Analyst Tina Fordham came on to discuss the uprising in Venezuela.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
This week, "Avengers: Endgame" directors Joe and Anthony Russo joined to discuss their record-breaking new Marvel movie. Beyond Meat Founder and CEO Ethan Brown came on to talk about his plant-based protein company's IPO, which was the best debut since the financial crisis. Jason Boyce, Co-Founder and CEO of Avenue7Media joined to discuss his experience as a third-party seller on Amazon and how the site has evolved from a partner to a competitor. Then Citgroup's Chief Political Analyst Tina Fordham came on to discuss the uprising in Venezuela.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
